text: Xalapa (often spelled Jalapa, ; ; officially Xalapa-Enríquez ) is the capital city of the Mexican state of Veracruz. In the 2005 census the city reported a population of 387,879.Link to tables of population data from Census of 2005 INEGI: Instituto Nacional de Estadística, Geografía e Informática. The municipality has an area of 118.45 km². Xalapa lies near the geographic center of the state and is the second-largest city in the state after the city of Veracruz to the southeast. ==References== Category:Capital cities in Mexico Category:Settlements in Veracruz
title: Xalapa
